arcs.headline: Complete Audio Suite: Music, Transcription, and Emotional Speech
arcs.summary: A massive expansion of audio capabilities: we added 'elevenmusic' for track generation, Whisper Large V3 for transcription, and upgraded TTS to ElevenLabs v3 to support emotional tags like [laughing]. Includes full API support for model discovery.

arcs.headline: Fresh UI: Unified headers and a sleek new look
arcs.summary: The platform received a visual glow-up with a redesigned authorization page, a unified header containing user controls, and a persistent AI theme bar for easier navigation.

arcs.headline: Meet Polly: The AI bot bridging Discord and GitHub
arcs.summary: We launched Polly, an intelligent Discord bot that lets developers trigger coding agents and manage PRs directly from chat. We also prepped for GSOC and lowered pricing for Gemini Search.

arcs.headline: Image Model Tuning: Better aspect ratios and stability
arcs.summary: Optimizations for Flux Klein, Sana, and Twinflow improve generation stability. We also fixed an issue where Klein-9B was squashing wide images, ensuring aspect ratios are now respected.

one_liner: A massive audio update brings music generation and emotional TTS, alongside a sleek frontend redesign and a new Discord coding bot.
